revision.text:
'''Eggs''' are items that contain Pokémon. Eggs can be obtained in two ways: buying them from [[shops]] or breeding level 100 Pokémon. Getting the egg through the latter method will boost the bred Pokémon's attack by 25% of its base attack. == Shop Egg Pool == In the following tables, '''bolded''' names indicate Pokémon that can only be obtained in their respective regions by hatching shop eggs. === '''[[Kanto]]''' === {| class="wikitable" |- ! [[Fire Egg|Fire]] !! [[Grass Egg|Grass]] !! [[Water Egg|Water]] !! [[Electric Egg|Electric]] !! [[Fighting Egg|Fighting]] !! [[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | [[File:Charmander.png|40px]] '''Charmander''' || [[File:Bulbasaur.png|40px]] '''Bulbasaur''' || [[File:Squirtle.png|40px]] '''Squirtle''' || [[File:Magnemite.png|40px]] Magnemite || [[File:Hitmonchan.png|40px]] '''Hitmonchan''' || [[File:Dratini.png|40px]] '''Dratini''' |- | [[File:Growlithe.png|40px]] Growlithe || [[File:Oddish.png|40px]] Oddish || [[File:Lapras.png|40px]] '''Lapras''' || [[File:Pikachu.png|40px]] Pikachu || [[File:Hitmonlee.png|40px]] '''Hitmonlee''' || [[File:Dragonair.png|40px]] Dragonair |- | [[File:Ponyta.png|40px]] Ponyta || [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout || [[File:Staryu.png|40px]] Staryu || [[File:Voltorb.png|40px]] Voltorb || [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machop || [[File:Dragonite.png|40px]] Dragonite |- | [[File:Vulpix.png|40px]] Vulpix || [[File:Tangela.png|40px]] Tangela || [[File:Psyduck.png|40px]] Psyduck || [[File:Electabuzz.png|40px]] Electabuzz || [[File:Mankey.png|40px]] Mankey ||
--- |} === '''[[Johto]]''' === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! [[Fire Egg|Fire]] !! [[Grass Egg|Grass]] !! [[Water Egg|Water]] !! [[Electric Egg|Electric]] !! [[Fighting Egg|Fighting]] !! [[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | [[File:Cyndaquil.png|40px]] '''Cyndaquil''' || [[File:Chikorita.png|40px]] '''Chikorita''' || '''Totodile''' || [[File:Chinchou.png|40px]] Chinchou || [[File:Tyrogue.png|40px]] Tyrogue ||
--- |- | '''Houndour''' || [[File:Sunkern.png|40px]] '''Sunkern''' || [[File:Wooper.png|40px]] Wooper || [[File:Mareep.png|40px]] Mareep ||
--- ||
--- |- | Slugma || [[File:Hoppip.png|40px]] Hoppip || [[File:Marill.png|40px]] Marill || Elekid ||
--- ||
--- |- | Magby ||
--- || [[File:Qwilfish.png|40px]] Qwilfish ||
--- ||
--- ||
--- |} === '''[[Hoenn]]''' === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! [[Fire Egg|Fire]] !! [[Grass Egg|Grass]] !! [[Water Egg|Water]] !! [[Electric Egg|Electric]] !! [[Fighting Egg|Fighting]] !! [[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | '''Torchic''' || '''Treecko''' || '''Mudkip''' || '''Electrike''' || Makuhita || '''Bagon''' |- | Numel || '''Roselia''' || '''Feebas''' || Plusle || Meditite || Shelgon |- | || Tropius || Clamperl || Minun || || Salamence |} === '''[[Sinnoh]]''' === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! [[Fire Egg|Fire]] !! [[Grass Egg|Grass]] !! [[Water Egg|Water]] !! [[Electric Egg|Electric]] !! [[Fighting Egg|Fighting]] !! [[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | '''Chimchar''' || '''Turtwig''' || '''Piplup''' || '''Pachirisu''' || '''Riolu''' || '''Gible''' |- | || '''Carnivine''' || Finneon || Shinx || || Gabite |- | || Budew || Buizel || || || Garchomp |} ==Helpful Info== When you enter the next area the Pokémon rates change. Assuming you've just entered [[Sinnoh]] the [[Water Egg]] table changes from ===In [[Hoenn]]=== (Squirtle, Lapras, Staryu, Psyduck) (Totodile, Wooper, Marill, Qwilfish) (Mudkip, Feebas, Clamperl) (Mudkip, Feebas, Clamperl) ===In [[Sinnoh]]=== (Squirtle, Lapras, Staryu, Psyduck) (Totodile, Wooper, Marill, Qwilfish) (Mudkip, Feebas, Clamperl) (Mudkip, Feebas, Clamperl) (Piplup, Finneon, Buizel) (Piplup, Finneon, Buizel) (Piplup, Finneon, Buizel) (Piplup, Finneon, Buizel) Which makes the chance of getting a Pokémon from the new region you entered 50% and dropping the total combination of all previous areas percent's down to 50% {{Eggs}}
[[Category:Eggs]]
